mapper.insert: INSERT INTO arttab_member (mem_email, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_detail_addr, mem_bank, mem_acc, mem_auth, mem_createdDate, mem_status) VALUES(#{memberEmail}, sha1(#{memberPwd}), #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberDetailAddr}, #{memberBank}, #{memberAcc}, #{memberAuth}, #{createdDate}, #{memberStatus});
mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_email, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_detail_addr, mem_bank, mem_acc from arttab_member order by mem_no asc
select mem_no, mem_email, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_detail_addr, mem_bank, mem_acc, mem_createdDate from arttab_member where mem_no=#{memberNo}
select mem_no, mem_name, mem_email, mem_createdDate from arttab_member where mem_email=#{memberEmail} and mem_pwd=sha1(#{memberPwd})
